title: compress: gofix for flate,gzip,zlib NewWriter changes
body:
A gofix is needed for:
1. renaming gzip.Compressor to gzip.Writer (and s/Decompressor/Reader/).
2. rewriting w, _ := foo.NewWriter -> w := foo.NewWriter.
3. possibly flagging any un-gofixable renames, such as w, err := foo.NewWriter.
